steps: step 2: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on hyperlink_team_project_executions --> navigate to Page_executions
step 4: At Page_executions click on hyperlink_test_runs --> navigate to Page_overview
step 5: At Page_overview click on hyperlink_configurations --> navigate to Page_test-project
step 6: At Page_test-project click on hyperlink_testcloud_tunnels --> navigate to Page_testCloudTunnel
step 7: Add visual checkpoint at Page_testCloudTunnel
